messages.subject: unschooling conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Sandra...and others participating in the conference.  I know a wonderful tropical island out in the East China Sea that would be a great location for the
messages.messageBody:
Hey Sandra...and others participating in the conference. I know a
wonderful tropical island out in the East China Sea that would be a
great location for the next unschooling conference <big grins>. How
I would love to fly back and join the one in SC. The flight isn't
really THAT long <sheepish grin>. Really, I envy those able to
attend and wonder if tapes will be available? (I could probably
arrange for free room & board :)
Michelle
